name: Donepezil hydrochloride
indications: donepezil hydrochloride tablets indicated treatment dementia alzheimer ’ type . efficacy demonstrated patients mild , moderate , severe alzheimer ’ disease .
contraindications: mild moderate alzheimer ’ disease : 5 mg 10 mg daily ( 2.1 ) moderate severe alzheimer ’ disease : 10 mg 23 mg daily ( 2.2 )
adverseReactions: donepezil hydrochloride tablets contraindicated patients known hypersensitivity donepezil hydrochloride piperidine derivatives .
indications_original: Donepezil hydrochloride tablets are indicated for the treatment of dementia of the Alzheimer’s type. Efficacy has been demonstrated in patients with mild, moderate, and severe Alzheimer’s disease.
contraindications_original: Mild to Moderate Alzheimer’s Disease: 5 mg to 10 mg once daily (2.1) Moderate to Severe Alzheimer’s Disease: 10 mg to 23 mg once daily (2.2)
adverseReactions_original: Donepezil hydrochloride tablets are contraindicated in patients with known hypersensitivity to donepezil hydrochloride or to piperidine derivatives.
